accountDescription: Manage your session and account data.
guestAccountDescription: Your data is not saved permanently.
signOutConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to sign out?
displayDescription: Customize the look and feel of the app.
deleteLocalDataConfirm: This will delete all guest data (anonymous posts) from this device. This action cannot be undone.
guestDescription: Sign in or Sign up to permanently save your profile, points, and activity.
forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address. We'll send you a link to reset your password.
bioPlaceholder: Tell us a little about yourself
aiAnalysisDescription: Ask the AI to analyze your activity and award you a unique achievement badge based on your contributions.
